segments.text: My gaze drifts from the sink to the center of the kitchen, where the real action is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy, balancing precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly; its legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up, stretching his whole body towards an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I clearly see a jar labeled “COOKIE JAR” filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of his hands is already inside, snatching cookies, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if he's using the plate to catch them, a clever little thief!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Standing nearby is a girl, her arm raised, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, but her attention is completely fixed on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together, a perfect team of mischief-makers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool doesn't tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It would be a disaster, with cookies everywhere and a possible fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem utterly focused on their sugary prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a bold operation, especially with an adult in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a daring pair, I must say.
segments.speaker: PAR
